lead_paragraph: FISHMAN--Leonard. The Officers, Board of Governors, The Women's Group, Members and Staff of The Muttontown Club mourn the passing of our beloved member, Leonard Fishman, and extend our sincerest condolences to his wife Susan Fishman and their children, Holly and Jon and their families. Robert Sherman, President 1/3
